newsitem.title: USA: Quintiles in India joint venture.
newsitem.headline: Quintiles in India joint venture.

text.p: Quintiles Transnational Corp said Thursday that it has signed a letter of intent to form a joint venture with Core Healthcare Ltd, an India-based healthcare company, to offer clinical trial management services in India.
The joint venture company, Quintiles Spectral Ltd, will provide clinical trials management services to Indian pharmaceutical companies and international clients.
The ownership of Quintiles Spectral, which will be evenly split between both parties, is expected to be structured through subsidiaries or affiliates of both companies.
